mapper.select: SELECT userName, accountName, depaId, useFlag, remark, ur.roleId FROM t_user u LEFT JOIN t_user_role ur ON ur.userId = u.id WHERE id = #{userId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM t_user WHERE userName = #{userName}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_user SET accountName = #{accountName}, depaId = #{depaId}, useFlag = #{useFlag}, tenantName = #{tenantName}, trade = #{trade}, address = #{address}, telephone = #{telephone}, linkName = #{linkName}, linkPhone = #{linkPhone}, remark = #{remark}, updateTime = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_user WHERE id in ${userIds}
DELETE FROM t_user_role WHERE userId in ${userIds}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_user ( userName, password, credentialsSalt, depaId, locked, useFlag, tenantName, trade, address, telephone, linkName, linkPhone, remark, createTime, updateTime ) VALUES ( #{userName}, #{password}, #{credentialsSalt}, #{depaId}, #{locked}, #{useFlag}, #{tenantName}, #{trade}, #{address}, #{telephone}, #{linkName}, #{linkPhone}, #{remark}, NOW(), NOW() );
